subtitle: Gruyere cheese is added to a classic potato dish. Goes well with grilled or roasted meats or fish.

method.text: Preheat oven to 200°C. Grease either a cake tin or a shallow casserole with some of the butter.
Dry the potato slices very well on kitchen paper.
Blend the remaining butter with a generous amount of seasoning.
Arrange the potatoes in layers, making sure the slices overlap slightly. Brush each layer with some of the butter. Add thin slices of cheese to each layer.
Brush the top layer of the potatoes with the last of the butter. Cover the tin or dish with foil. Bake for 45 min. Remove foil. Cook for 15 min.
If cooked in a tin, invert over a heated serving dish.
Garnish with a sprinkling of mixed herbs.

title: Swiss potatoes anna
